bibl.title: with contributions by Luke FALVEY, Colin A. HOPE, Daniel JONES, Johanna PETKOV and Louise WOODFIELD, The 2010 Field Season at Deir Abu Metta, Dakhleh Oasis.

series.title: Bulletin of the Australian Centre for Egyptology
BACE

bibl.note: 2010 season of excavation at Deir Abu Metta, December 24th 2009 - January 6th 2010. - The interior of the church. - The structures to the north of the church. - The West Buildings. - The structures to the south of the West Building addition. - The path between the West Building and the church. - Discussion.
